name: Thanksgiving Day Mosaic
description: Pick out a turkey, decorate the house and invite people over! Thanksgiving Day Mosaic has 120 patchwork-style puzzles for all the family!
minimum_requirements: 最低配備: 作業系統: Windows XP or higher 處理器: 1500 MHz 記憶體: 512 MB 記憶體 DirectX: 版本：9.0 儲存空間: 220 MB 可用空間
